vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for installation of playground equipment and replacement of a curb ramp with Whirlix Design, LLC through the Texas Association of School Boards (BuyBoard) for the Willie Mae Butler Playground Renovation located at 3700 Dixon Avenue - Not to exceed $135,565.52 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
